title: Individuals Course
subtitle: Protect Yourself and Your Family from Daily Digital Threats
description: A comprehensive 2-hour course designed for everyday users to recognize and defend against phishing, smishing, romance scams, financial fraud, and other common digital threats.
target_audience: General consumers, less tech-savvy users, anyone managing personal finances online

chapters.title: Understanding the Threat Landscape
chapters.description: Learn about the global scale of phishing and why everyone is a potential target

chapters.title: Email Phishing Scams
chapters.description: Identify common email phishing tactics and recognize red flags

chapters.title: Smishing - Text Message Scams
chapters.description: Understand SMS phishing threats and safe mobile messaging practices

chapters.title: Social Media Scams
chapters.description: Protect yourself on Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, and other platforms

chapters.title: Banking and Financial Scams
chapters.description: Recognize financial institution phishing and payment app vulnerabilities

chapters.title: Package Delivery Scams
chapters.description: Identify fake delivery notifications and track packages safely

chapters.title: Romance Scams
chapters.description: Understand emotional manipulation tactics and protect yourself on dating platforms

chapters.title: Tax and IRS Scams
chapters.description: Recognize IRS impersonation and understand how tax agencies actually communicate

chapters.title: Cryptocurrency and Investment Scams
chapters.description: Spot fraudulent investment schemes and cryptocurrency scams

chapters.title: Online Shopping and E-Commerce Scams
chapters.description: Identify fraudulent retailers and shop safely online

chapters.title: Recognizing Psychological Manipulation
chapters.description: Understand how scammers exploit human emotions and build mental defenses

chapters.title: What To Do If Targeted or Compromised
chapters.description: Learn immediate response steps and recovery procedures
